Sorry it took so long to respond.

> 1. I bought the full version for $10 from a store, but didn't
register. Would registering have given me access to more scenarios or
something like that? If it does, how can I get those scenarios now?

A registered version gives you access to use scenarios created by
various people such as Telvido and myself.

> 2. Is the ultimate goal of the game to beat Jakara (or whatever his
name is)? Something that really bothers me about this game is it never
says "The end" or "Congratulations, you win!" or anything... there
just aren't any more opponents on the levels anymore.

The ultimate goal of the game?  Hmm.  In my set, the ultimate goal is
take out Subian, an archmage who has very high experience level.  [Of
course, I've wondered if, when I revised my scenarios, I didn't make
it too easy.  Oh well, there's a really powerfull slime to make up for
it.]

> 3. Why are there golems and giant skeletons programmed in the game
if they never show up in any ordinary scenarios?

Because we can use them.  I've used Giant Skeletons and Golems and so
has Telvido in his set.
